entity.label: Account Name

validators.errorMsg: Account Name must not exceed 50 characters.
Account name should not contain whitespace and must start with a letter and followed by alphabetic letters, digits or underscores.

entity.help: Enter a unique name for this GitHub account.

entity.label: Personal Access Token
entity.help: Enter the personal access token generated for this GitHub account.

validators.errorMsg: Length of password should be between 1 and 8192
Maximum length allowed for host is 4096
Proxy Host is invalid
Maximum length allowed for username is 50
Maximum length allowed for password is 8192
